text: hey joseline with Walter's world and

I just want to do a little video really
quick about tipping in Scotland so
generally in Scotland you tip 10 percent
for waitstaff and 10 percent also for
taxis or you can just round up with the
taxis so typically at a bar you don't
tip unless you're buying like a whole
round and then you just sort of throw
down a pound or so and that's usually
what's expected so thanks for watching
